name: Superman
description: Superman is also known as the Man of Steel and is one of the most powerful superheroes of all.

powers.label: flight
powers.description: He can fly faster then the speed of light.

powers.label: invulnerability
powers.description: Fire can't burn him, knives can't cut him and bullets can't hurt him.

powers.label: super strength
powers.description: He has titanic strength with the ability to raise tremendous weights.

name: Hulk
description: Hulk possesses an incredible level of superhuman physical ability, his capacity for physical strength is potentially limitless.

powers.label: leaping
powers.description: In a single leap, he can cover hundreds of miles.

powers.label: shock wave
powers.description: Slams his hands together creating a shock wave comparable to hurricanes and sonic booms.

powers.label: strength
powers.description: Potentially limitless his strength increases proportionally with his level stress, anger in particular.

name: Wolverine
description: Wolverine has a tough-guy attitude, unbreakable adamantium skeleton, retractable claws and self healing ability.

powers.label: claws
powers.description: Has razor sharp adamantium claws.

powers.label: healing
powers.description: Can heal himself no matter the damage in seconds.

powers.label: indestructible
powers.description: Has metal adamantium bonded to his skeleton.

name: Thor
description: Thor is one of several powerful ancient beings who dwell in a magical realm called Asgard.

powers.label: mjolnir
powers.description: His hammer, allows him to command the powers of the storm, causing rain, thunder and lightning.

powers.label: odinforce
powers.description: Enables him to tap into cosmic and mystical energies, enhancing all of his abilities.

powers.label: strength
powers.description: Greater than the vast majority of his superhuman race.

name: Batman
description: Batman is the superhero protector of Gotham City, who fights against evil and strikes terror into the hearts of criminals everywhere.

powers.label: fearless
powers.description: Able to face and deal with danger or fear without flinching.

powers.label: gadgets
powers.description: He has the most advanced gadgets in the world.

powers.label: stealth
powers.description: Can avoid danger and creep up on villains.

name: Iron Man
description: Iron Man fights for justice as a modern day knight in high-tech armor and weapons.

powers.label: durability
powers.description: He is like a human tank.

powers.label: flight
powers.description: Can fly faster then a jet.

powers.label: weaponry
powers.description: Has weapons such as repulsor rays, the uni-beam, rockets and turrets.

name: Captain America
description: Captain America defends the U.S. and the world from evil threats and is armed with an indestructible shield.

powers.label: healing
powers.description: Can heal broken bones and torn muscles in a day.

powers.label: martial art
powers.description: Mastered american-style boxing and judo.

powers.label: strength
powers.description: Stronger then any human and can lift 2 to 4 tons.

name: Wonder Woman
description: Wonder Woman is gifted with a wide range of superhuman powers and superior combat and battle skills.

powers.label: flight
powers.description: Can fly at sub light speed

powers.label: invulnerability
powers.description: Can withstand bullets and resistant fire and magic.

powers.label: lasso of truth
powers.description: Lasso that is strong enough to confine superman and it makes you tell the truth.

name: Storm
description: Storm is the descendant of an ancient line of African priestesses and can control the weather.

powers.label: control weather
powers.description: Can control and manipulate the weather.

powers.label: flight
powers.description: Can fly by creating winds strong enough to support her weight.

powers.label: temperature immunity
powers.description: Immune to extreme cold and hot temperatures.

name: Beast
description: Beast possesses superhuman strength, agility, endurance and speed, despite his bulk.

powers.label: agility
powers.description: Able to crawl up brick walls.

powers.label: speed
powers.description: Can run on all fours at approximately 40 miles per hour.

powers.label: strength
powers.description: His legs are so powerful he can jump around 25 feet in the air.
